text: Cleveland State University is a public university in Cleveland, Ohio. The university has about 14,000 students. It was founded in 1881 as Fern College and then was later established again in 1964 when it was renamed Cleveland State University. The current president of the university is Laura J. Bloomberg. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Vikings. They have 17 varsity teams and they compete in the Horizon League and the Eastern Wrestling League for wrestling. ==Other websites== *Cleveland State University's Official website *Cleveland State Vikings' Official athletics website Category:Horizon League Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:Cleveland Category:1964 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Ohio
title: Cleveland State University
